body_html:
@Raghu-kapur your error-message reads: NotFoundError (see above for traceback): Unsuccessful TensorSliceReader constructor: Failed to find any matching files for ... then nothing.

This sounds like there is a missing parameter.

Did you provide the option --trained_checkpoint_prefix with the prefix als value for your model for the export_inference_graph.py script?

@redbullpeter it looks like providing a full path to the model also works for the --trained_checkpoint_prefix option: --trained_checkpoint_prefix /home/mySkel/myPathToTheModel/model.ckpt-101
